participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and a bit quirky, Jordan enjoys the simple pleasures in life and has a love for music.
participant_1.background: I could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it. I smoke two packs of cigarettes most days. I enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee. If I were to be reincarnated, I would want to come back as a hippopotamus. I cannot get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit eccentric, Alex embraces her love for all things whimsical and has a unique perspective on life.
participant_2.background: I enjoy all things my little pony. I like to watch anime. I draw all of my friends as my little pony characters. I like cats. I like being weird.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Lindsey Stirling's music. I love her violin playing.
Me too! I've seen her in concert twice. She's amazing!
I wish I could see her in concert. She's probably expensive to see.
She's not as expensive as you might think. I think I paid $40 for my ticket.
That's not too bad. I might have to go see her next time she's in town.
You should! You won't be disappointed.
So, you like anime. What's your favorite anime?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think my favorite is Madoka Magica.
I've heard good things about that one. I've been meaning to check it out.
It's a really good show. It's dark and twisted, but it's also really beautiful.
I like dark and twisted. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I think you'd like it.
So, you like cats? What's your favorite kind of cat?
I love all kinds of cats, but I think my favorite kind is the Maine Coon. They're so big and fluffy!
I've never seen a Maine Coon up close. I'll have to look into them.
You should! They're amazing cats.
So, you like being weird. What's the weirdest thing you've ever done?
I once ate an entire jar of pickles.
That's pretty weird! Did you like it?
I did! I love pickles.
Me too! I could eat them every day.
Me too! I love them with peanut butter.
I've never tried them with peanut butter. I'll have to give that a try.
You should! It's delicious.
